basics.name: Zeb Lakey
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a third-year student studying for a B.S in Computer Science from the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawai'i at Manoa. I am projected to graduate in Spring 2025.

work.summary: Applied VDO to categorize software vulnerabilities from the National Vulnerability Database
highlights: Assisted in the development of a ML model that predicts outcomes of unclassified vulnerabilities
Completed over 1200 annotations of vulnerabilities for the model to learn from

work.summary: Worked on a project involving Natural Language Processing and LLMs
highlights: Created a full Python script that generated language-learning C-tests
Designed a pipeline for a user to be able to retrieve a test with a click of a button

work.summary: Continued the project and worked on assorted programming/IT tasks for the CLT
highlights: Assisted faculty and staff with assorted projects around the CLT
Monitored computer labs and helped users with technical issues

work.summary: Completed a variety of tasks for the SOA Netlab
highlights: Updated and maintained the school's website
Assisted faculty, students, and staff with technical issues involving computers, projectors, lecterns, printers, cameras, and other technical equipment.

awards.title: Provost Achievement Scholarship
awards.summary: 4-year merit scholarship awarded to 96 Hawai'i high school students for high achievements in academics, sports, and extracurriculars.

awards.title: CNS Native Hawaiian Scholarship
awards.summary: Merit scholarship awarded to high achieving students of Native Hawaiian descent.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Distinction given to students at or above a 3.5 gpa on a semester-by-semester basis.
